availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of W. S. Pilcher. Married to Bettie Y. Murrell Pilcher. Father of Emily R. Pilcher. Delegate to Frankfort and Legrange Democratic Conventions.

bibl.p: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, Garnettsville, District 5, p. 28. Kentucky, Death Records, 1852-1964, Ancestry, Louisville, 1893. U.S. City Directories, 1822-1995, Ancestry, Louisville, 1869. "Personals," Courier-Journal, (1869-1922), Nov. 14, 1897. p A2. "Card from J. E. Pilcher, Esq.", *Daily Courier (1851-1868): March 18, 1867, p 1.
